fxInfo_responses.value: No. There may be popular songs identified with the nation but there is no official, staterecognized national anthem.
Yes. There is an official, state-recognized national anthem.

fxInfo_sources: CCP (v67); Bristow, Michael Jamieson (ed). 2006. National Anthems of the World, Eleventh Edition. Casell. www.nationalanthems.info; https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/theworld-factbook; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_historical_national_anthems.
